name: RINGS
description:
Trapped within a prison comprised of concentric rings, you must align all of the rings' apertures order to escape - however, turning one ring may move others, and being spotted will undo all of your progress.

Disclaimer: The levels are randomized somewhat, so it's possible I haven't caught some bugs. Every level is generated from the completed state however, so there ought not be any unsolvable puzzles.

This game was created in a few days for the 'Tenth Creative Games Jam' hosted by Creative Games.
